compatibility.notes: APSL-1.0 is compatible with most permissive licenses, but GPL-derived licenses are incompatible.

key_requirements: You must include a notice stating that you have modified the Original Code and indicating the extent to which you have modified it.
Your modifications must be made available under this License, including but not limited to making the Source Code of any Modifications publicly available under this License.
license.name: APSL-1.0
obligations: You must notify Apple of any changes you make to the Original Code, including but not limited to new patent applications that are necessary to use, reproduce and/or distribute the Modified Code without infringement.

You must provide Apple with a written notice within 30 days of your making any modification(s) to the Original Code or combining the Original Code with other code in such a way as to form a Larger Work.
